prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Organ, Guitar, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Organ, Guitar, and Drums, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Organ, Guitar, and Drums, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
This song has Bass, Organ, Guitar, and Drums, but Piano is not included.
